term.title: cistactic polymer

item.text: A tactic polymer in which the main-chain double bonds of the configurational base units are entirely in the cis arrangement.

term.citation: Citation: 'cistactic polymer' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.C01091

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
